TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PromptBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 创建空的 对象，并为添加内容、选择语音、控件语音属性和控件朗读单词的发音提供方法。

span.span: Creates an empty object and provides methods for adding content, selecting voices, controlling voice attributes, and controlling the pronunciation of spoken words.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 ，你可以向提示添加各种内容类型，包括纯文本、SSML 标记 (作为字符串或文件) 、录制的音频，甚至另一个 对象。With , you can add a variety of content types to a prompt, including plain text, SSML markup (as a string or a file), recorded audio, or even another object. 若要将文本追加到 对象并根据需要控制语音特性（例如强调、速率和音量），请使用 方法之一。To append text to a object and optionally control voice attributes such as emphasis, rate, and volume, use one of the methods. 你还可以使用和方法将语音属性控制为 组 。You can also control voice attributes as a group with the and methods. 您可以使用 、 、 、 或 方法追加文本和控制所讲述的内容，或者如何对其进行说明。You can append text and control what is spoken or how it is pronounced using the , , , , or methods. 使用重载方法之一在提示中更改当前所选的语音语音 ，命名特定语音以使用或指定所需的语音特征，例如年龄和性别。Change the currently selected speaking voice in the prompt using one of the overloaded methods, naming a specific voice to use or specifying required voice characteristics, such as age and gender. 若要从对象生成语音 ，可以将其作为参数传递给 方法。To generate speech from a object, you can pass it as an argument to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [构造复杂提示](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361616(v%3doffice.14))。For more information, see [Constructing a Complex Prompt](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361616(v%3doffice.14)).

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

param.name: culture
param.span: 提供有关特定区域性的信息，如其语言、区域性的名称、写入系统、使用的日历以及如何设置日期和排序字符串。

span.span: Provides information about a specific culture, such as its language, the name of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例并指定区域性。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies a culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数设置属性的值 。This constructor sets the value for the property. 对象将尝试选择支持参数所指定的语言的已安装语音 `culture` 来处理提示。The object will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to process the prompt. 如果找到具有指定区域性的语音，将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到具有指定区域性的语音，将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要按参数所指定的语言正确地发音单词 `culture` ，必须安装支持该语言的语音合成 (文本到语音转换或 TTS) 引擎。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎称为 "语音"。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取有关针对特定区域性安装的声音的信息，请使用 方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 Speech API 接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码作为的值 `culture` 。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. Windows 7 附带的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - en-us。en-US. 英语（美国）English (United States) - zh-chs-CN。zh-CN. 中文（中国）Chinese (China) - zh-chs-幼圆。zh-TW. 中文（台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 还允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如 "en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 实例，并指定它的 。The example that follows creates a instance and specifies its . ```csharp using System.Speech.Synthesis; public void MySimpleText () { PromptBuilder builder = new PromptBuilder(new System.Globalization.CultureInfo("en-US")); builder.AppendText("Hello world!"); } ``` 下面的标记显示了等效的 SSML：The following markup shows the equivalent SSML: ```xml Hello world! ```

summary.span: 将包含 SSML 标记的指定字符串追加到 对象。

span.span: Appends the specified string containing SSML markup to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加 SSML 标记时，必须使用适当的转义符。You must use the appropriate escape characters when appending SSML markup. 请注意，引号前面的反斜杠将属性值括 `interpret-as` 在下面的示例中：Notice the backward-slashes preceding the quotation marks enclosing the value of the `interpret-as` attribute in the following example: ```csharp builder.AppendSsmlMarkup(" chair "); ``` > [!NOTE] > 用作的参数的字符串 不能包含 `speak` 元素。The string used as an argument to cannot include a `speak` element. 当使用在 元素中指定内联发音时 `phoneme` ，可以使用以下任何拼音字母表中的电话，前提是当前语音引擎支持此功能：When using to specify inline pronunciations in a `phoneme` element, you can use phones from any of the following phonetic alphabets, provided that the current speech engine supports it: - 国际注音字母表 (IPA) International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) - 通用手机集 (UPS) Universal Phone Set (UPS) - SAPI 手机集SAPI Phone Set 任何符合 SSML 标准的语音引擎都将 IPA 的电话。Any SSML-compliant speech engine will speak phones from the IPA. 还可以使用其中一种方法追加包含 SSML 标记的文件 。You can also append a file containing SSML markup using one of the methods. 若要追加未使用标记语言进行口述的文本，请使用 、 、 或 方法之一。To append text to be spoken that is not formatted with markup language, use one of the , , , or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 中的语音合成引擎目前不支持强调参数。The speech synthesis engines in Windows do not support the emphasis parameter at this time. 设置强调参数的值将导致合成的语音输出中无任何可听见的更改。Setting values for the emphasis parameter will produce no audible change in the synthesized speech output.

summary.span: 将文本追加到 对象，并指定在该追加的文本位置处朗读的别名文本。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the alias text to be spoken in place of the appended text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这允许文档同时包含口述和书面形式的提示。This allows a document to contain both a spoken and a written form for a prompt. 例如，编写的窗体可能是一个缩写词，如 SAPI，口述的窗体可能是首字母缩写词（在此例中为语音应用程序编程接口）的扩展文本。For example, the written form could be an acronym, such as SAPI, and the spoken form could be the expanded text for the acronym, in this case Speech Application Programming Interface. ## Examples 下面的示例将一个文本字符串 ( "Speech 合成标记语言" ) 及其别名 ( "SSML" ) 添加到 对象。The following example appends a text string ("Speech Synthesis Markup Language") and its alias ("SSML") to a object. 合成器将按 "S S M L"。The synthesizer will pronounce "S S M L". ``` PromptBuilder alias = new PromptBuilder(); alias.AppendTextWithAlias("Speech Synthesis Markup Language","SSML"); ```

summary.span: 将文本追加到 对象，并指定该文本的内容类型。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the content type of the text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来指定枚举中未包含的内容类型 。You can use this method to specify a content type that is not included in the enumeration. 但是，TTS 引擎必须支持您指定的参数。However, the TTS engine must support the parameter that you specify.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendTextWithPronunciation (string textToSpeak, string pronunciation);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendTextWithPronunciation(string textToSpeak, string pronunciation) cil managed
Public Sub AppendTextWithPronunciation (textToSpeak As String, pronunciation As String)

param.name: textToSpeak
param.span: 包含使用语言传统字母表写入形式的单词的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the written form of the word using the conventional alphabet for a language.

param.name: pronunciation
param.span: 包含要以国际音标 (IPA) 进行朗读的电话的字符串。

span.span: A string containing phones to be spoken from the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).

summary.span: 将文本追加到 对象，并为该文本指定发音。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the pronunciation for the text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 合成器讲述参数的内容 `pronunciation` ，而不是参数的内容 `textToSpeak` 。The synthesizer speaks the contents of the `pronunciation` parameter, not the contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter. 在提示中以内联方式指定的发音仅适用于单词的单个匹配项，并替代语音引擎或其当前活动词典的发音。Pronunciations specified inline in prompts apply only to the individual occurrence of a word and override pronunciations of the speech engine or any of its currently active lexicons. 通常，你将使用内嵌发音来自定义发音，或将其用于不常见单词的发音，如适当的名称，因为语音合成引擎可能不会对其进行发音和预期。Typically, you will use inline pronunciations for custom pronunciations of existing words or for pronunciation of uncommon words, such as proper names, which the speech synthesis engine may not pronounce as well as expected. 必须使用国际拼音字母表 (IPA) 中的手机指定内联发音。Inline pronunciations must be specified using phones from the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA). 电话是表示声音的合理声音的字母或字符。A phone is a letter or character that represents a discreet sound of speech. 符合 [语音合成标记语言 (SSML) 版本 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763) 规范的语音引擎将从 IPA 中。Speech engines that comply with the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763) specification will pronounce phones from the IPA. 若要使用其他拼音字母指定内联发音，请参阅 。To specify inline pronunciations using other phonetic alphabets, see . IPA 发布了一个列出其手机的 [图表](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=58362) ，并将其映射到 Unicode 数字。The IPA publishes a [chart](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=58362) that lists its phones and maps them to Unicode numbers. IPA 字母表中的某些手机具有与拉丁字母相同的表示形式。Some phones in the IPA alphabet have the same representations as letters in the Latin alphabet. 在这些情况下，可以键入拉丁字符，并为手机提供正确的表示形式。In those cases, it is possible to type the Latin character and have the proper representation for a phone. 由于文本中常使用的拉丁字符可能表示 IPA 手机集的多个电话，因此只需键入拉丁字符可能不会导致精确的 IPA 手机。Because the Latin characters as commonly used in text may represent several phones of the IPA phone set, simply typing the Latin character might not result in the precise IPA phone desired. IPA 字母表中的其他手机需要在代码中以字符串形式表示 ( # A0) 、数字符号 ( # ) ，并以十六进制或十进制格式表示所需手机的 Unicode 号，后面跟一个分号 (; ) 。Other phones of the IPA alphabet need to be represented in code as character references consisting of an ampersand (&), the number sign (#), and a Unicode number for the desired phone in hexadecimal or decimal, all followed by a semicolon (;). 例如， ( # B0 \# x0259; ) 将由表示 `ə` 。For example, a schwa (&\#x0259;) would be represented by `ə`. 若要为多个单词添加新的或自定义的发音，例如，为了表达地区方言或者要添加特定于教育或医疗学科的专有名称或词汇，请生成一个词典并使用将其添加到中 。To add new or custom pronunciations for multiple words, for example to express regional dialects or to add proper names or vocabulary that is specific to an educational or medical discipline, build a lexicon and add it to the using . ## Examples 下面的示例初始化类的新实例 。The following example initializes a new instance of the class. 然后，它将文本字符串 "My name is" 追加到该实例。It then appends the text string "My name is" to the instance. 最后，它会附加一个包含正确名称 "DuBois" 的字符串，并指定名称的发音。Finally, it appends a string containing the proper name "DuBois" and specifies the pronunciation of the name. ```csharp public void ProperName() { PromptBuilder builder = new PromptBuilder(); builder.AppendText("My name is"); // Add a proper name and its pronunciation. builder.AppendTextWithPronunciation("DuBois", "duˈbwɑ"); } ``` 以下标记显示了此 对象生成的 SSML。The following markup shows the SSML that this object generates. ```xml My name is DuBois ```

span.span: International Phonetic Association

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearContent() cil managed

summary.span: 清除 对象中的内容。

span.span: Clears the content from the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ Culture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); void set(System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ value); };
member this.Culture : System.Globalization.CultureInfo with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的区域性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the culture information for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象将尝试选择一个已安装的语音，该语音支持由属性指定的语言 来处理提示。The object will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the property to process the prompt. 如果找到具有指定区域性的语音，将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到具有指定区域性的语音，将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 还可以使用 、和方法，在提示中为内容的部分部分指定区域性 。A culture may also be specified within the prompt for discreet sections of content using the , , and methods. 使用上述方法之一为部分内容指定的区域性将重写 属性，并 将尝试选择支持方法的参数所指定的语言的已安装语音 `culture` 。A culture specified for a portion of content using one of the above methods will override the property while in effect, and the will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter of the method. 若要按属性所指定的语言正确地发音单词 ，必须安装支持该语言的语音合成 (文本到语音转换或 TTS) 引擎。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the property, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎称为 "语音"。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取有关针对特定区域性安装的声音的信息，请使用 方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 Speech API 接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码作为的值 `culture` 。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. Windows 7 附带的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - en-us。en-US. 英语（美国）English (United States) - zh-chs-CN。zh-CN. 中文（中国）Chinese (China) - zh-chs-幼圆。zh-TW. 中文（台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 还允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如 "en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. 有关语言代码的完整列表，请参阅 [语言标识符常量和字符串](/windows/win32/intl/language-identifier-constants-and-strings)。For a comprehensive list of language codes, see [Language Identifier Constants and Strings](/windows/win32/intl/language-identifier-constants-and-strings).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndParagraph() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的段落结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of a paragraph in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将长时间的提示分为句子和段落，则可以更好地呈现这些提示。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. 有关示例，请参见 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndSentence() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的句子结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of a sentence in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将长时间的提示分为句子和段落，则可以更好地呈现这些提示。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. 有关示例，请参见 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndStyle() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的样式结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of a style in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法停止当前说话样式。The method stops the current speaking style. 讲话样式会恢复为在 方法启动新的说话风格之前生效的设置。The speaking style reverts to the setting that was in effect before the method initiated a new speaking style. 有关示例，请参见 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndVoice() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 对象中的语音使用结束。

span.span: Specifies the end of use of a voice in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法停止使用当前语音语音输出。The method stops the use of the current voice for speech output. 语音恢复到在 方法启动新语音之前生效的设置。The voice reverts to the setting that was in effect before the method initiated a new voice.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartParagraph(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

param.name: culture
param.span: 提供有关特定区域性的信息，如语言、区域性的名称、写入系统、使用的日历以及如何设置日期和排序字符串。

span.span: Provides information about a specific culture, such as the language, the name of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.

summary.span: 指定 对象中指定区域性中的段落开始。

span.span: Specifies the start of a paragraph in the specified culture in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将长时间的提示分为句子和段落，则可以更好地呈现这些提示。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. `culture`段落的参数可以不同于 包含它的对象的属性。The `culture` parameter for a paragraph can be different than the property of the object that contains it. 当有效时，参数的值 `culture` 将重写 属性。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property. 将尝试选择支持参数所指定的语言的已安装语音 `culture` 来朗读段落。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the paragraph. 如果找到具有指定区域性的语音，将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到具有指定区域性的语音，将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用由指定的语音 ，请调用 。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 若要按参数所指定的语言正确地发音单词 `culture` ，必须安装支持该语言的语音合成 (文本到语音转换或 TTS) 引擎。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎称为 "语音"。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取有关针对特定区域性安装的声音的信息，请使用 方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 Speech API 接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码作为的值 `culture` 。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. Windows 7 附带的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - en-us。en-US. 英语（美国）English (United States) - zh-chs-CN。zh-CN. 中文（中国）Chinese (China) - zh-chs-幼圆。zh-TW. 中文（台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 还允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如 "en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartSentence(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

param.name: culture
param.span: 提供有关特定区域性的信息，如语言、区域性的名称、写入系统、使用的日历以及如何设置日期和排序字符串。

span.span: Provides information about a specific culture, such as the language, the name of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.

summary.span: 指定 对象中指定区域性中的句子开始。

span.span: Specifies the start of a sentence in the specified culture in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将长时间的提示分为句子和段落，则可以更好地呈现这些提示。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. `culture`句子的参数可以不同于 `culture` 包含句子的段落的参数或 包含它们的对象的属性。The `culture` parameter for a sentence can be different than the `culture` parameter for the paragraph that contains the sentence or the property of the object that contains them. 在此过程中，参数的值 `culture` 将覆盖 包含句子的段落的属性和 `culture` 参数。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property and the `culture` parameter for the paragraph that contains the sentence. 将尝试选择一个已安装的语音，它支持参数所指定的语言 `culture` 对句子进行口述。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the sentence. 如果找到具有指定区域性的语音，将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到具有指定区域性的语音，将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用由指定的语音 ，请调用 。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 若要按参数所指定的语言正确地发音单词 `culture` ，必须安装支持该语言的语音合成 (文本到语音转换或 TTS) 引擎。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎称为 "语音"。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取有关针对特定区域性安装的声音的信息，请使用 方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 Speech API 接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码作为的值 `culture` 。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. Windows 7 附带的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - en-us。en-US. 英语（美国）English (United States) - zh-chs-CN。zh-CN. 中文（中国）Chinese (China) - zh-chs-幼圆。zh-TW. 中文（台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 还允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如 "en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartStyle(class System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle style) cil managed

param.name: style
param.span: 要开始的样式。

summary.span: 指定 对象中的样式开始。

span.span: Specifies the start of a style in the object.

summary.span: 指示合成器更改 对象中的语音。

span.span: Instructs the synthesizer to change the voice in a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语音表示已安装 TTS 引擎。A voice represents an installed TTS engine. 使用 方法和 类获取已安装的文本到语音 (TTS) 语音的名称和特性，你可以选择。Use the methods and class to obtain the names and attributes of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 当应用程序调用时 ，该方法会验证它在注册表中找到的每个声音是否满足某些最小标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 对于验证失败的任何语音， 将其 属性设置为 `False` 。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序不能 对其属性为的语音调用任何方法 `False` 。An application cannot call any of the methods on a voice whose property is `False`. 通常，应用程序不会设置语音的 属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice's property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartVoice(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

param.name: culture
param.span: 提供有关特定区域性的信息，如语言、区域性的名称、写入系统、使用的日历以及如何设置日期和排序字符串。

span.span: Instructs the synthesizer to change the voice in the object and specifies the culture of the voice to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的 `culture` 参数 可以不同于 包含它的对象的属性 。The `culture` parameter for can be different than the property of the object that contains it. 当有效时，参数的值 `culture` 将重写 属性。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property. 将尝试选择支持参数所指定语言的已安装语音，以表达 `culture` 和所包含的内容 。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the content enclosed by and . 如果找到具有指定区域性的语音，将使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到具有指定区域性的语音，将使用默认语音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用由指定的语音 ，请调用 。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 若要按参数所指定的语言正确地发音单词 `culture` ，必须安装支持该语言的语音合成 (文本到语音转换或 TTS) 引擎。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安装的 TTS 引擎称为 "语音"。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要获取有关针对特定区域性安装的声音的信息，请使用 方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 Speech API 接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码作为的值 `culture` 。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. Windows 7 附带的 TTS 引擎支持以下语言-国家/地区代码：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - en-us。en-US. 英语（美国）English (United States) - zh-chs-CN。zh-CN. 中文（中国）Chinese (China) - zh-chs-幼圆。zh-TW. 中文（台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 还允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如 "en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

Public Sub StartVoice (gender As VoiceGender, age As VoiceAge, voiceAlternate As Integer)
public: void StartVoice(System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceGender gender, System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceAge age, int voiceAlternate);
member this.StartVoice : System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceGender * System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceAge * int -> unit

param.name: gender
param.span: 要使用的语音的性别。

span.span: The gender of the voice to use.

param.name: age
param.span: 要使用的语音的年龄。

param.name: voiceAlternate
param.span: 在多个语音与 和 参数相匹配时指定首选语音的整数。

span.span: An integer that specifies a preferred voice when more than one voice matches the and parameters.

summary.span: 指示合成器更改 对象中的语音并指定其性别、年龄以及与指定的性别和年龄匹配的首选语音。

span.span: Instructs the synthesizer to change the voice in the object and specifies its gender, age, and a preferred voice that matches the specified gender and age.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语音合成引擎对为指定参数找到的匹配项进行计数，并在计数等于参数时返回声音 `voiceAlternate` 。A speech synthesis engine counts the matches it finds for the specified parameters, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter. 使用 方法和 类获取已安装的文本到语音 (TTS) 语音的名称和特性，你可以选择。Use the methods and class to obtain the names and attributes of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 使用 call 指定的语音停止 。To stop using the voice specified by call .

summary.span: 返回从 对象生成的 SSML。

span.span: Returns the SSML generated from the object.

returns.span: 返回从 对象生成的作为单个行的 SSML。

span.span: Returns the SSML generated from the object as a single line.
